Uses of Class
be.belgium.eid.security.Certificate

Packages that use Certificate
be.belgium.eid.security   
 

Uses of Certificate in be.belgium.eid.security
 

Subclasses of Certificate in be.belgium.eid.security
 class AuthenticationCertificate
          This class contains the Authentication certificate which is a certificate for verifying data on a smart card.
 class CACertificate
          This class contains the Certificate Authority certificate which is a certificate for verifying data on a smart card.
 class HardCodedRootCertificate
          The HardCodedRootCertificate class contains the hard coded root certificate for the BEID against which other certificates should be verified.
 class RNCertificate
          The RN certificate is the (National Register) certificate for verifying identities.
 class RootCertificate
          This class contains the Root certificate which is a certificate for verifying data on a smart card.
 class SignatureCertificate
          This class contains the signature certificate which is a certificate for verifying data on a smart card.
 

Methods in be.belgium.eid.security with parameters of type Certificate
static boolean OCSPClient.processOCSPRequest(Certificate issuer, Certificate cert, java.lang.String hostaddr)
          Sends a OCSP request to the given host address and processes the reply.
